name: B'Lass Project!
description:
B'Lass Project is a 2D platformer that mixes the fast-paced side scrolling action of Sonic 3 with the technical acrobatics of rocket jumping from games like Team Fortress 2 and Quake. It stars 63, a monster girl on a mission to re-unite with her sister.

This is the first demo of the B'Lass Project, and includes the first world of the game, a silvery beach world. I am actively developing the game as its sole developer, and will be continually updating this page as I progress. Everything in this demo was made by me except for the music, which was composed by the ever talented Distorted Schematic <3
